content: उपावृत् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To turn or go towards, approach. {@--2@} To turn away from, return. {@--3@} To give. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To win over, induce; <ls>Māl. 8.</ls> {@--2@} To cause to turn; lead or bring back; <ls>M. 5.</ls> {@--3@} To give to. {@--4@} To cause, produce. {@--5@} To stretch out more and more.
